articles.description: A Soyuz space capsule carrying NASA’s Kate Rubins and Russians Sergey Ryzhikov and Sergey Kud-Sverchkov landed at 0455 GMT (12:55 a.m. EDT) Saturday in the steppes of Kazakhstan.
articles.content:
MOSCOW - An American astronaut and two Russians have returned to Earth after six months aboard the International Space Station.
